title: Add ESXi host in mRemoteNG
author: m0hossa
body_snippet: Iam trying to add ESXi hosts in mRemoteNG but it does support to connect to the ESXi host on web. Is there a way to add ESXi host in nRemoteNG?

comments.snippet: I too have tried this of recent and stumbled upon the same question being asked here. Anyone been able to achieve this and how please?
